text: Karlovčić () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Pećinci municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 1,243 people (2002 census). ==Sports== On June 5, 2009, the first representative Cricket match in Serbia's history was played in Karlovčić between the Serbia national cricket team and the Carmel & District Cricket Club. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia Category:Populated places in Srem District Category:Pećinci
title: Karlovčić
